1082.question: What systems are tested?
1082.response: {'Answer': 'The systems tested are two types of x-vector/PLDA systems: a BULATS-trained baseline system and a VoxCeleb-based system. The VoxCeleb-based system is further tested with PLDA adaptation and extractor fine-tuning.'}
1082.answer:
BULATS i-vector/PLDA
BULATS x-vector/PLDA
VoxCeleb x-vector/PLDA
PLDA adaptation (X1)
 Extractor fine-tuning (X2)
